data.title: Jackson, Manalapan Township & Toms River, NJ
data.meta_description: Brooklyn Square Pizza is a local pizzeria with locations in Jackson, Manalapan Township & Toms River, NJ. Stop by our pizza shop today. Serving authentic Italian cuisine.
data.text:
Do you want traditional Italian pizza made with fresh ingredients and classic recipes? Are you looking for a local pizzeria that offers a wide variety of Italian favorites? Come to Brooklyn Square Pizza in Toms River, Manalapan Township or Jackson Township, NJ for a pizzeria experience with personality. We combine the true mom and pop pizza experience with years of pizza-making technique to create a pizza that's worth talking about.

As a family-owned local pizzeria, we take pride in being able to provide you with delicious food and excellent customer service at each of our three locations. We put care and attention to detail into every dish we make, drawing on traditional Italian recipes to create a meal you'll love as much as we love preparing it for you.

Don't take our word for it. Try our local pizza today to see why we should be your new favorite pizza shop.

With our menu full of classic Italian and local pizzeria favorites, you're sure to find something new to savor every time you visit. You can choose from:

Our famous upside-down pizza pies

Fresh fried calamari

Brooklyn roast beef

Ready for an unforgettable meal? Visit our pizza shop today to try a slice of our mouthwatering pizza.
